channel.title: Food on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Simba Tango

item.title: In search for the authentic
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by MR38 We love our Argentine Tango (or maybe Tango Argentino) to be sure. Do not bastardize it, please. We want the real thing! On the other hand, there is no one tango. Tango is a living expression of the people who play, sing, listen to and dance it. My tango is different from yours, or I sure hope so. Not too different, but a little different. That’s what makes it interesting.

item.title: Sabor a tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
